resources.string: N\'trip is an app destined to bring people\nwith common interests in everyday\nthings together to take trips

nTrip is an app destined to bring people with common interests in everyday things together to take trips.

nTrip allows users to create trip plans to different places and different purposes ,invite people you may on may not know before.

nTrip is designed to make sure you don't take your next skiing trip alone again. Plan a trip post it invite people meet new friends have fun
